author: Megan McArdle
title: Covid-19 is going to do to businesses what it has done to people - The Washington Post
description: When the virus subsides, Americans may find that many of the stores they used to frequent remain shuttered, permanently.
content:
Full coverage of the coronavirus pandemic
We remain optimistic about JCPenneys ability to weather this pandemic, chief executive Jill Soltau said in a news release. If thats actually true, shes about the only one. Burdened by debt and struggling with declini… [+4459 chars]
